results.title: Subconscious Password
results.creator_credit: Chris Landreth, Mark Smith, Marcy Page, Seneca College Animation Arts Centre, Copperheart Entertainment and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description:
Most of us have had at least one of those excruciating social encounters where you can’t remember someone’s name. Just what is your subconscious up to while you frantically try to recall it?
Cast includes: Don McKellar, Ron Pardo, Patrice Goodman, Ray Landry, Tony Daniels, Athena Karkanis, Nanci Pach, Kedar, Denise Oliver, Dwayne Hill, Chris Landreth and John R. Dilworth.
Music: Daniel Janke
Animation direction and layout: Sean Craig
results.creator_credit_for_label: Chris Landreth, Mark Smith, Marcy Page, Seneca College Animation Arts Centre, Copperheart Entertainment and National Film Board of Canada

results.title: Java: island of culture
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Indonesia”.
Illustrates the traditional Javanese arts of wood carving, painting, Batik dyeing, Wayang Kulit and Wayang Wong theatre as they are today, and briefly tours some of the ancient temples of the Island. Narrated by Roger Climpson.

results.title: Bali: island of gods and demons
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Indonesia”.
Bali, one of the many islands that make up the Indonesian nation, is a tropical paradise. Religion plays a great part in the daily life of the people and we see many fine temples and some of their religious ceremonies. Narrated by Roger Climpson. No other credits available.

results.title: Sub-Igloo [French version]
results.creator_credit: Joseph MacInnis, James de B. Domville, Colin Low and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: Film report from a Canadian scientific expedition that put a plastic bubble on the floor of the Arctic Ocean to serve as workshop and rest station for scientists working below the Arctic ice. What it took, in both planning and on-the-spot improvisation, to chop through the heavy ice, and to lower and anchor the huge dome in place in the dark and cold of Resolute Bay, is fully illustrated by film and commentary. French language - no subtitles. (Award: Bordeaux.)
results.creator_credit_for_label: Joseph MacInnis, James de B. Domville, Colin Low and National Film Board of Canada
results.description: Film report from a Canadian scientific expedition that put a plastic bubble on the floor of the Arctic Ocean to serve as workshop and rest station for scientists working below the Arctic ice. What it took, in both planning and on-the-spot improvisation, to chop through the heavy ice, and to lower and anchor the huge dome in place in the dark and cold of Resolute Bay, is fully illustrated by film and commentary. French language - no subtitles. (Award: Bordeaux.)

What it took, in both planning and on-the-spot improvisation, to chop through the heavy ice, and to lower and anchor the huge dome in place in the dark and cold of Resolute Bay, is fully illustrated by film and commentary. French language - no subtitles. (Award: Bordeaux.)

results.title: Sub-igloo
results.creator_credit: Colin Low, James de B. Domville, Joseph MacInnis and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: Film report from a Canadian scientific expedition that put a plastic bubble on the floor of the Arctic Ocean to serve as workshop and rest station for scientists working below the Arctic ice. What it took, in both planning and on-the-spot improvisation, to chop through the heavy ice, and to lower and anchor the huge dome in place in the dark and cold of Resolute Bay, is fully illustrated by film and commentary. Award: Bordeaux.

results.title: Leaving My Country
results.creator_credit: Grant Hood, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: An argument with his uncle one night would turn out to be a life-changing experience for Grant Hood, a proud Kurnai Gunai man. Grant mentions the importance of his meeting with Kutcha Edwards when he first arrives in Melbourne. A photo of a very young Kutcha is also shown.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Grant Hood, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
